definition: to transfer (a patient for treatment in a different hospital)
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: Conclusion Take some effective measures to enhance the transferring rate of TB patients successfully.
sentences.chinese: 結論採取有效的措施，提高病人的轉診到位率。

sentences.english: In counselling, one has to be honest and explain that a referral does not guarantee success.
sentences.chinese: 但在提供諮詢時，必須誠實並說明轉診不能保證成功。

sentences.english: Objective To probe the source of smear-positive patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析塗陽肺結核病人轉診情況。

sentences.english: When these are not available, there should be referral options.
sentences.chinese: 如果不能提供這些，則應具備轉診方案。

sentences.english: One convention presenter explored ways to avoid a referral situation altogether.
sentences.chinese: 一個參會者講述了關於避免轉診治療情況發生的方法。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To carry out an empirical study on dual referral of pregnant women and lying-in women for childbirth and health care.
sentences.chinese: 目的開展孕產婦分娩與保健雙向轉診的實證研究。

sentences.english: I need a full referral system for my zen cart based website.
sentences.chinese: 我需要爲我的禪車爲基礎的網站充分轉診制度。

sentences.english: Convergence case-management plays a major role in the new smear-positive case finding.
sentences.chinese: 綜合醫院可疑者轉診是發現新發塗陽病例的主要途徑。

definition: consultation (medical)/to meet for diagnosis/(by extension) consultation of different specialists
see 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]
to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
(TCM) interrogation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]
